tasks.summary: Core OSS contributor to Eclipse Velocitas™ within the Eclipse Foundation; developed a toolchain focused on empowering automotive application developers with scalable, container-based solutions and supporting open-source innovation standardization.

Developed a CLI package manager for the Eclipse Velocitas™ toolchain, implementing lifecycle management for the development environment of vehicle applications, allowing developers to focus on business logic while the CLI handles environment setup, runtime and maintenance.

Designed and developed the ETAS Vehicle App Generator, an end-to-end solution leveraging generative AI to transform natural language prompts into vehicle applications. The system handles application generation, building, provisioning and real-time deployment on ETAS EDGE Middleware solution devices.
Developed a performance testing tool for the Eclipse Kuksa™ Databroker, a gRPC service written in Rust acting as a broker for vehicle data, optimizing data handling and throughput.

Designed and developed a VSCode extension for ETAS' automotive EDGE middleware, enabling CAN Bus to VSS signal mapping, gRPC service definitions, client API creation, and middleware debugging. Mentored the team to streamline workflows and ensure successful implementation.

Developed a personal voice-assistant system, including a recipe inspiration system with a machine learning recommendation engine, improving recipe discovery for users and enhancing user interaction through voice commands.
Developed a backend for hazard spot warnings using map, navigation, and GPS data, enhancing safety alerts for users.
Developed a vehicle- & fleet-management platform for the vehicle lifecycle and control unit devices, optimizing fleet management processes.
Developed a cloud-based development platform, improving efficiency, automation, and availability for application development.
Developed a user management and provisioning UI for the cloud-based platform, enabling self-service for users and cloud resource management.
Set up and maintained production infrastructure for a cloud-based predictive maintenance tool, ensuring its stable operation.
Established a cloud-based, containerized web app with CI/CD pipelines, streamlining deployment and development workflows.
Completed a comprehensive dual study program combining theoretical education in Software Engineering with hands-on industry experience, working in software development and DevOps.
Gained expertise in Java, software architecture patterns and DevOps practices, while applying them to real-world projects during work phases.
Developed a strong foundation in system design, code optimization, and Agile methodologies, contributing to various software engineering projects.
Bachelor of Science in Business Informatics: Application Development.
